name: TheQube
description:
Ever thought how worse a game can get? Well I have the answer to your question!

Welcome to some random cube-moving-thingy game! Really exciting!!
It is a really short game and can be completed in one sitting(unless you are playing lmao). It only consists of 4 levels- Easy, Medium, Hard and of course Impossible where easy is the easiest and impossible is umm yea impossible(incase you didn't knew yeah you are welcome)

This game was made as a personal project within a month or something. I actually left game development completely for over a year and coming back again was definitely a big decision. While working on this project I somehow felt this game would blow up(of course like bruh) and rarely would be known.. Still I managed to keep myself motivated and make this piece of ****. It was really difficult putting things up again after a year of nothing but yeah.

That's all I have to say, really really sorry if you didn't like this game I totally understand it(I also don't like this game tbh) but that's the best I could have done. Again sorry if it didn't matched your expectations but yeah I would surely try to match it next time. Peace out and happy qubing!
